did.abstract: A History of the Parachute Jump, Coney Island, New York prepared by Helen A. Harrison (Historical Consultant, Hardesty & Hanover, Consulting Engineers) in Spring 1983 for the City of New York. Photocopied typescript with black and white photographic prints and 16 color slides.

scopecontent.p: A History of the Parachute Jump, Coney Island, New York prepared by Helen A. Harrison (Historical Consultant, Hardesty & Hanover, Consulting Engineers) in Spring 1983 for the City of New York. Photocopied typescript with black and white photographic prints and 16 color slides.

prefercite.p: A history of the parachute jump, Coney Island, New York, Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library
